page.title: 05CLEETHORPES-HOLIDAY RESORT.
page.content: The Borough of Cleethorpes placed as it is on the mouth of{River Humber}is a popular holiday resort. It has large stretches of{golden sand,}all kinds of children's amusements, a large leisure centre, a boating lake and other attractions all within a few seconds walk from the beach. Throughout the summer many and various types of entertainment are arrainged for the locals and tourists. These attractions range from the Miss Cleethorpes competition, the'Radio One Road Show', a carnival parade to a 'crazy week', where people attempt strange and wonderful activities such as bear mat flipping and raft racing competitions. The whole season is packed with interesting things to do. People come to Cleethorpes from many places but the majority come from Yorkshire,mostly for day trips.
